about_the_game:
Motomancer: Auto Battle on Stream is an Auto-Battler Battle Royale for Twitch! Up to 32 chatters will battle it out in an arena full of vehicles, obstacles, and motorcycles as they use their skills to try and become the last man riding.

Players will be able to choose from a variety of different classes, each with their own unique stats, to take on their opponents.
Chat command-based mini-games will reward chatters with healing, increase attack speed and unleash tide-turning super attacks.

On-screen leaderboards will keep track of each player's kills, deaths, and points as the battle rages on. When the battle is over, the winner will receive a crown and the “Champion” title in the next match.

So get ready, get set and LET'S RIDE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit: 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070 (or better) or Radeon RX 580 (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: A casual auto-battler built for Twitch streamers! Let up to 32 of your viewers duke it out while dodging obstacles and collecting power ups in post-apocalyptic arenas!
